And the idea was that you could submit a compute-intensive job to us and we would route that job to potentially more than one cloud. So, we might say you need lots of memory or you need lots of CPU compute cycles. We can give you a competitive cost on Amazon, perhaps not such a competitive price point on another cloud provider, and you would be able to choose which platform it would run on.
